cast.overview: In the aftermath of an unspeakable act of terror, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the Boston Marathon bombers before they strike again.
cast.title: Patriots Day
cast.character: College Girl Outside of Sean Collier's #1 (uncredited)

details.biography: Alexandria Tait is an American actress trained in the Method. She was born on May 17th in Rhode Island and is of Italian, English, Scottish, Irish, and Native American ancestry. She began her acting career participating in community theater productions and often attended plays across the East Coast with her mother. Her father encouraged her pursuit of acting. She has since studied and worked across the country in Los Angeles, New York City, and Boston.
details.name: Alexandria Tait
